name: Sagan's Robocraft
description:
Welcome to your first day at Sagan’s Robocraft!

As one of our newest (and from what we are told brightest!) repair technicians we have high expectations for you! Since you seem to have allocated and accumulated a lot of data related to the droids that we repair, we assume you do not need any assistance in getting started.

Good luck!

Sagan's Robocraft is a WebGL game and also supports the Oculus Quest!

Sagan's Robocraft was created as part of HomeTeamGameDev and would not have been possible with the contributions and support from the Lighthouse community.

If you are interested in hometeamgamedev check out: https://hometeamgamedev.com/

**WebGL Controls**

WASD + Mouse = Movement

Spacebar = Pickup/Drop Objects

'M' = Mute

**Quest VR Controls**

Left Joystick = Move

Right Joystick = Change direction

Right/Left Triggers = Pickup/Drop Objects
